definitions.definition: ( especially in the plural ) Tattered clothes ( clothing ).
examples: —What a pretty dress! —What, this old rag ?
It's semiformal. I can't show up dressed in rags !

definitions.definition: A piece of old cloth , especially one used for cleaning, patching, etc.; a tattered piece of cloth; a shred or tatter .
( derogatory ) A shabby, beggarly person; synonym of ragamuffin .
( nautical , slang ) A sail , or any piece of canvas.
( singular or plural , slang ) Sanitary napkins , pads , or other materials used to absorb menstrual discharge .
( slang , derogatory ) A newspaper or magazine , especially one whose journalism is considered to be of poor quality.
( poker ) A poor, low- ranking kicker .
examples: I have ace-four on my hand. In other words, I have ace- rag .

definitions.definition: ( slang , theater ) A curtain of various kinds.
( dated ) A person suffering from exhaustion or lack of energy .

main_definition: ( especially in the plural ) Tattered clothes ( clothing ).
secondary_definitions: A piece of old cloth , especially one used for cleaning, patching, etc.; a tattered piece of cloth; a shred or tatter .

definitions.definition: A coarse kind of rock, somewhat cellular in texture; ragstone .

main_definition: A coarse kind of rock, somewhat cellular in texture; ragstone .

definitions.definition: ( dated ) A prank or practical joke .
( UK , Ireland ) A society run by university students for the purpose of charitable fundraising .

main_definition: ( dated ) A prank or practical joke .
secondary_definitions: ( UK , Ireland ) A society run by university students for the purpose of charitable fundraising .

definitions.definition: An informal dance party featuring music played by African-American string bands.
A ragtime song, dance or piece of music.

main_definition: ( obsolete , US ) An informal dance party featuring music played by African-American string bands. [19th c.]
secondary_definitions: A ragtime song, dance or piece of music. [from 19th c.]
